com.scene7.qa.benchmark
Class Status

java.lang.Object
  com.scene7.qa.benchmark.Status

public class Status
extends java.lang.Object

A class that handles calculation of current query execution progress.
Currently used for progress bar when building or resetting test case categories.

Version:
Jul 25, 2012
Author:
hewong
